code: import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{FaUser}from"react-icons/fa";import{IconContext}from"react-icons";import"./AppNavbar.css";import{useAuth}from"../contexts/AuthContext";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppNavbar=_ref=>{let{theme,toggleTheme}=_ref;const{user,logout}=useAuth();const[dropdownOpen,setDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const toggleDropdown=()=>{setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen);};const handleLogout=()=>{logout();setDropdownOpen(false);navigate("/login");};const profileRedirect=()=>{setDropdownOpen(false);navigate("/profile");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/journal",className:"logo-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/logoEmberLight.jpg",alt:"Logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/journal",className:"nav-link",children:"DIARIO"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/chat",className:"nav-link",children:"CHAT"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-right",children:[user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"user",children:["Bienvenido, ",user.username,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,title:theme==='light'?'Modo Oscuro':'Modo Claro',style:{background:"none",border:"none",fontSize:"1.3rem",cursor:"pointer",marginLeft:"1rem"},"aria-label":"Cambiar tema",children:theme==='light'?'‚òÄÔ∏è':'üåô'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconContext.Provider,{value:{className:"nav-icon"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-icon",onClick:toggleDropdown,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUser,{})})}),dropdownOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-option",onClick:profileRedirect,children:"Perfil"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logout-option",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]})]});};export default AppNavbar;
